package.name: lxqt-config
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} jobcount=2 if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then DISTCC_HOSTS="$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" export DISTCC_HOSTS jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" fi cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr . make -j $jobcount
